profiles.name: Johhny Iceman
profiles.review: However, I can confirm the criticism regarding handling and processing of other buyers. The user manual and packaging are also cheap.

profiles.name: Ivan Mekulin
profiles.review: Domačice su uvijek bile moja omiljena čokoladna biskvit desert poslastica nakon ručka koju ću uzimati redovito nakon objeda u podnevnim satima svakoga dana

profiles.review: The product sounds all good on paper but so far it lacks support and functionality.
